Reason: The configuration option '_journalSerializer' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'journalSerializer()' method is called within the 'create()' method, which is a critical part of creating the Prevayler. The 'journalSerializer()' method involves serialization operations, which can be time-expensive and memory-expensive. These operations directly impact the performance of the system at the system level, making the configuration performance-sensitive.
